title.rendered: Hibiki 17yo White Heron Limited Edition Japanese Blended Whisky 43% 700ml

content.rendered:
A limited edition bottle of Hibiki 17yo with a hand painted label, The White Heron Beckons, by Japanese artist Shirasagi. The label pictures an egret, a type of heron native to Japan.
Limited 2000 bottles

excerpt.rendered: A limited edition bottle of Hibiki 17yo with a hand painted label, The White Heron Beckons, by Japanese artist Shirasagi. The label pictures an egret, a type of heron native to Japan. Limited 2000 bottles
